close() - Method in class FileIO
Closes the connection to a file.

EOF() - Method in class FileIO

F

FileIO - Class in <Unnamed>
This class abstracts the basic Java File I/O classes to make File I/O more straightforward.
FileIO(String, int) - Constructor for class FileIO
General purpose constructor that can be used to specify a file and whether it is for reading or for writing.
FileIO(String, String) - Constructor for class FileIO
Constructor used to read in tokens from a file.
FileIO(String, String, int) - Constructor for class FileIO
General purpose constructor that can be used to specify a file and a path and whether it is for reading or for writing.
FileIOException - Exception in <Unnamed>
 
FileIOException(String) - Constructor for exception FileIOException
 
FOR_READING - Static variable in class FileIO
The constant used to indicate that a file is for reading
FOR_WRITING - Static variable in class FileIO
The constant used to indicate that a file is for writing

G

getTokens() - Method in class FileIO
Returns the tokens from a single line of text read from a file.

R

readLine() - Method in class FileIO
Reads in a line of text from a file.

W

writeLine(String) - Method in class FileIO
Writes a line of text to a file.
